frame.name: People_by_religion
frame.definition:
<def-root>This frame contains words for individuals, i.e. humans, with respect to their <fen>Religion</fen>. The <fen>Religion</fen> is generally incorporated, but with some lexical units it is specified separately.
<ex>The bells call the <t><fex name="Person">faithful</fex></t> to evensong <fex name="Religion">DNI</fex></ex> <ex>A <fex name="Age">90-year-old</fex> <t><fex name="Person">Baptist</fex></t> claims to have seen God personally in his backyard.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Origin
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Origin</fen> is the place where the <fen>Person</fen> was born or lived a salient part of her or his life.</def-root>

FE.name: Persistent_characteristic
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Persistent_characteristic</fen> is a physiological characteristic or personality trait of the <fen>Person</fen> which is conceived of as persisting over time.</def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Descriptor</fen> is a temporary condition of the <fen>Person</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Age
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Age</fen> is the length of time the <fen>Person</fen> has been alive.</def-root>

FE.name: Ethnicity
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Ethnicity</fen> is the racial, national, socio-economic or cultural group to which the <fen>Person</fen> belongs.</def-root>

FE.name: Religion
FE.definition: <def-root>The religious belief system that the <fen>Person</fen> follows. </def-root>

lexUnit.name: ongelovige.n
lexUnit.definition: die niet gelooft aan bepaalde godsdienstige waarheden
